scripts.say: Enterprise, I'm sooo bored~ Why don't we go grab Minneapolis and then head to shore for a barbecue?
Saratoga, don't be too relaxed. Our mission isn't to be taken lightly.
Got it, I was just joking~ This air base is really important, isn't it? I may like to play around, but I wouldn't forget that!
Our enemies won't sit by idly while we occupy this place. Our recon planes have already confirmed that the Sakura Fleet is moving.
To make matters worse, Wasp had to head south to resupply. It's up to the two of us to make a difference here.
Come to think of it, I'm fortunate to have only gotten scratches from the last battle... Although if we were there at Savo, perhaps...
Meh, it's not your fault, Enty~ The decision was made by the top brass, wasn't it?
Though I'm upset that Astoria and the others were hurt, just being mad won't accomplish anything... We simply have to do what we have to do.
That's enough for now! Enterprise, I know just how stressed you've been lately~!
The battle isn't over yet. If you don't keep calm, you might make a mistake at a crucial moment. Relax, relax~
Sorry, Sara. I know you're still coping with Lexington, you don't have to worry about me.
It's fine, it's fine! Something like this is a walk in the park for me!
I'm sure that my sister would want me to keep my spirits up and get a punch in for her sake~
You're exactly right, I should learn from your example. I have to get back at the Sakura Fleet for my sister's sake as well.
All righty, that decides it~! So, wanna grab barbecue?
Hah... I suppose I'll take you up on that offer.
